duties_responsibilities.duty: Gain industry experience and network with other Alcon professionals.
Work on meaningful projects that will help patients and customers see brilliantly.
Participate in product development lifecycle, including requirements refinement, risk evaluations, testing, software development, troubleshooting, and project tracking.
Develop an understanding of the software development process used for medical device development.
Create effective data management & storage techniques for faster & easier access to data.
Analyze video data and perform literature search to support algorithm development.
Learn and understand next generation system data output and develop tools to collect and analyze the data.
Review clinical study reports and develop an understanding of the endpoints to generate medical evidence.

education_certification.credential: Must be pursuing at least a Bachelors level degree in Data Analytics, Computer Science/Engineering, Software, Information Technology, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Vision Science, Computational Data Analytics, Cybersecurity, Information Security, or Systems Engineering or a related major.
Must be enrolled in an accredited university or college for at least one semester prior to internship or co-op, and at least one additional semester following internship or co-op.
Must be authorized to work in the US on a permanent basis without requiring sponsorship.
Ability to commit to a 10-12 week, full-time (40 hours per week) summer internship.
